# sensometrics

{sensometrics} is a demo package for Sensory Analysis, used for the tutorial 'Create automatic and reproducible sensory reports with Quarto' at Sensometrics, Paris, June 2024.


### Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("ThinkR-open/sensometrics")
```
